caption.p: ( A) Photograph of the polydimethylsiloxane (PDMS) microchip. Channel and reservoirs were full of red ink for visualization. ( B) Microphoto of the process of microdroplets preparation at cross-junction channel. The velocity of aqueous phase and oil phase was 14 and 80 Î¼L/min, respectively. ( C) Microphoto of microdroplets off chip.
